Notice the Share Action Provider is thinner than expected (width is incorrect) on 2.x.
 On Android 2.1 mdpi devices, the share icon even gets truncated.
 Also notice the up arrow and share icon are white on white on Android 2.1 devices instead of dark grey on 2.3 and up.
 And no, the physical back button doesn't work here either.
